reviewText: more of a early 70's story line. Nude mussel men, but action lacking

it was nothing like any of the other dvds that Greenwood and Cooper have made.  it was so bad that I thru it in the trash.  I wish that they would make some more like centerfold or morning music, or pools of desire
nothing to say but keep your money and look for something better  the only good thing is the guys are sexy

The title is a matter of opinion.  I prefer "straight/traditonal" imaging.  It seems that every possible digital "trick" was used (way to excess).  In most cases the image quality is of the "pictorialist" variety.  Most -- if not all -- images were "noisy" and "fuzzy". Many may like this approach AND it is a matter of opinion as to what is good.

The nude underwater swimming scenes were FINE WORKS OF ART  -- and to me, these were worth keeping this DVD.  It IS all a matter of opinion.

At the end this DVD seemed to be a "Selling Piece" for the models.

None of the images are exquisity sharp -- I viewed it yesterday.  But this video is sufficiently interesting that I will most likely keep it.

This is my favorite release from Greenwood-Cooper Studios!  The guys are very attractive and seem to be having a great time throughout the entire production.  Their lack of inhibition and willingness to strip down for the camera give this feature a special charm that is rarely seen in productions like this.  The feature is very artistic (some great sequences with occult-type costumes and exotic settings) and the soundtrack couldn't be better suited for the subject matter.  Everybody that I've shown this to has fallen in love with it.  I took it to the local bar that I frequent, and the owners became so fond of it that they ordered their own copy and play it for the patrons with great frequency.  A great dvd to put on when you're having some friends over, don't feel like watching a movie, just have some great eye candy and music in the background (but don't be surprised if your buddies end up glued to the screen occasionally!).

Have I convinced you yet?!  Get this dvd before it's not available any longer (you never know), you really won't regret it.

I am happy to have brought this dvd. When i need a change from my others collection i put this one on. The only thing that disapoint me is when it comes to the back & white section it is very hard to see what they are doing,otherwise I am very happy with the whole content. I am looking forward to getting more of this wonderful dvd they are putting out.
This is a title unlike most of the ones I own.  It's a fun and sexy version of old MTV videos.  A little cheesy, but the guys are hot.
